name: NSFontTraitMask
desc: Constants for isolating specific traits of a font.

items.name: static var boldFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a bold font.

items.name: static var compressedFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a compressed font.

items.name: static var condensedFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a condensed font.

items.name: static var expandedFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies an expanded font.

items.name: static var fixedPitchFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a fixed pitch font.

items.name: static var italicFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies an italic font.

items.name: static var narrowFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a narrow font.

items.name: static var nonStandardCharacterSetFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a font containing a non-standard character set.

items.name: static var posterFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a poster-style font.

items.name: static var smallCapsFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a small-caps font.

items.name: static var unboldFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a font that is not bold.

items.name: static var unitalicFontMask: NSFontTraitMask
items.desc: A mask that specifies a font that is not italic.
